Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us, but considering your appreciation for its value, I'm willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you. I propose a price of $120 for the product. This offer includes a limited-time discount, ensuring you get a great deal. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product at an affordable price. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
